reviews.text: Had a great dining experience! The service was excellent and the food was delicious. The Vietnamese tea was a little on the bland side, but everything else made up for it. Loved the ambience with live music, and the staff were very attentiveâ€”made sure all our food arrived on time. Will definitely come back!

Came here after walking out of downtown east and found this quiet area located at the Aranda Club. Donâ€™t worry they are open to the public.  Good to get a table on a Friday night. Menu was very comprehensive. Lots of options especially if you come with a larger group. But also good for dining for 2. We decided to try different proteins, portions were just right. Options of beverages were wide for both alcohol and non alcoholic. Bad thing as Iâ€™ll need to take longer to decide. But this is a good problem to have. Was pretty suprise that the price offered good value. Iâ€™m sure will try again soon. Hope to come with a bigger group next time round. ðŸ˜Š

Located across from Downtown  East Shopping Mall, next to the car park.
Itâ€™s been open for a while, but I never had the chance to try it until today. This is my first time visiting the restaurant, and I just realized itâ€™s a Vietnamese restaurant, situated right in front of a clubhouse.

We came for a quick post-drink. Ordered two beers, a plate of grilled pork skewers, and a plate of French fries.
The grilled pork skewers were delicious, while the fries were just your typical fries.

The indoor seating area is quite spacious, and thereâ€™s also outdoor seatingâ€”seems like a great spot if you have pets. I also noticed the restaurant offers a wide selection of Vietnamese coffee for purchase.

I had the grilled chicken fried vermicelli and mango salad. Both were delicious! Good portion, can share if you donâ€™t want a heavy meal. I liked the fresh vegetables and herbs. Overall a very enjoyable meal!

First time here, they allow dog at their outdoor seating, will come here more often! Environment is very good, food taste good and fresh. Price is affordable & have wide variety on their menu. We had the Signature vermicelli bowl & BbQ pork Baguette, so good!
